name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
QA Engineer with extensive experience in test automation and functional testing, underpinned by a strong foundation in **Python**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Golang**. Proficient in QA methodologies, regression testing, and API testing, ensuring high-quality deliverables through meticulous defect tracking and adherence to structured processes.
Leveraging **cloud services** for scalable testing environments and deploying applications across both AWS and Azure. Well-versed in Agile methodologies, particularly **SCRUM**, to enhance team collaboration and project delivery. Demonstrated interpersonal skills and effective time management to drive projects forward while maintaining attention to detail. With over 13 years in software development, I bring a robust understanding of both frontend and backend systems, particularly in healthcare and financial sectors, enabling a comprehensive perspective on quality assurance.
